00001 <?php
00002 
00003 ns::import('hygia.libs.io.var.Variable');
00004 
00012 class RequestVars {
00013 
00014     private $aVariables;
00015 
00020     public function __construct() {
00021         $this->aVariables = array();
00022     }
00023 
00036     public function set($sName, $sValue = null, $sType = null) {
00037         if (is_null($sValue)) {
00038             if (stripos($sName, '=') === false) {
00039                 return false;
00040             }
00041             list($sName, $sValue) = explode('=', $sName);
00042         }
00043         $sName = trim($sName);
00044         if (isset($this->aVariables[$sName]) && is_null($sType)) {
00045             // preserve type when resetting variable
00046             $this->aVariables[$sName] = new Variable(trim($sValue), $this->getType($sName));
00047         } else {
00048             // set new variable
00049             $this->aVariables[$sName] = new Variable(trim($sValue), $sType);
00050         }
00051         return true;
00052     }
00053 
00060     public function get($sName) {
00061         return isset($this->aVariables[$sName]) ? $this->aVariables[$sName] : null;
00062     }
00063 
00070     public function getValue($sName) {
00071         return isset($this->aVariables[$sName]) ? $this->aVariables[$sName]->getValue() : null;
00072     }
00073 
00080     public function getType($sName) {
00081         return isset($this->aVariables[$sName]) ? $this->aVariables[$sName]->getType() : null;
00082     }
00083 
00090     public function getByType($sType = Variable::TYPE_DEFAULT) {
00091         $aVariables = array();
00092         foreach ($this->aVariables as $sName => $oVariable) {
00093             if ($oVariable->getType() == $sType) {
00094                 $aVariables[$sName] = $oVariable->getValue();
00095             }
00096         }
00097         return $aVariables;
00098     }
00099 
00100 }
